stem: Given question: What lawn is most likely to be on a street? and answer: front yard, explain why in
no_more_50_words: Front yards face the street, and usually have lawns.
50_to_100_words: A front yard is most likely to be on a street because it is the area of a property that is situated in front of a residence, and typically faces the street. This area is generally used for landscaping and other decorative purposes, as it is the part of the property that is most visible to the public. It is also common for the front yard to include a walkway or driveway leading to the front entrance of the house. Additionally, front yards are more likely to be landscaped and kept maintained as it creates a better curb appeal and it is more visible to the public.
